data.message: Are you guys honestly like serious? I bet u sick men jerk off 2 lesbians and then think it's not right to have gay marriage, gay marriage should b legalized no matter what u fking think, love is love and there's no control over it

replies.message: I am glad there are people like you to give me some hope for human kind.
'the consequences are grievous'....? How come this so called 'God' hasnt punished anyone so far then?

Romans 9:22  "What if God, desiring to show his wrath and to make known his power, has endured with much patience vessels of wrath prepared for destruction." And i'm not taking this out of context you can read for yourself. I don't mean to argue, but i just wanted to answer your question.
